name: Pop Block Color - Tap Cube
description:
Pop Block Color - Tap Cube is a new Tap and pop the blocks game with unique and special game play like never before!In this fun puzzle game, your goal is to tap 2 or more adjacent cubes of the same kind to crush and remove them from the board. Use your moves wisely and beat all the challenges to win points and level up.
Challenge is smart resolving these blocks with your best skill because your moves are limited and you can stuck at level anytime.
